trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_00<tab>Your time away has not lightened Surito Carito's mood.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_01<tab>Surito Carito reveals his latest theory: the voidsent bound within the amphora unleashed the sickness upon Nym, and fled from its cage after cloaking itself with dark magicks. He says you must track down this invisible voidsent, but that even a scholar of his experience needs time to discover where to start. In the meantime, he asks that you and Alka Zolka focus on training, and introduces Halga Tolga to guide you. Speak with this former officer of the vaunted Nymian Royal Marines near Bronze Lake, and start learning things the hard way.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_02<tab>After dressing you down, Halga Tolga demands you show your commitment to the Royal Marines. Demonstrate your resolve now by entering any expression containing the phrase “come hells or high water” with the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_03<tab>Halga Tolga cannot hear you. Show your spirit again by entering any expression containing the phrase “come hells or high water” with the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_04<tab>Grudgingly, Halga Tolga admits you have the spirit of a Royal Marine. Now, he bids you prove that you have the courage of one by finding the leader of the Mamool Ja to the east of Bronze Lake. Mock him and his ways with a great big /laugh, and defend yourself if he should take exception to your actions.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_05<tab>You have outraged and defeated a band of Mamool Ja. Report back to Halga Tolga near the Wanderer's Palace for your debriefing.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SEQ_06<tab>Though not overly impressed by either Alka Zolka or you, Halga Tolga concedes that you show promise. However, he is abundantly clear that you have a long way to go. Focus on honing your own skills, he orders you, and you may be able to defeat the invisible voidsent. Someday.
※The next scholar quest will be available from Surito Carito upon reaching level 58.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Halga Tolga.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “come hells or high water” to show your resolve to Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_TODO_02<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “come hells or high water” again to appease Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_TODO_03<tab>Mock the Mamool Ja leader with a /laugh and defend yourself if he attacks.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_TODO_04<tab>Report to Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_000<tab>Thank you for joining me. I gather your noses have not shrunk. And your ears...?
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_001<tab>Good, then you are safe. I think the voidsent inside the amphora summoned its kind to distract you while it fled, magically concealed.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_002<tab>Traces of this enchantment remain, but nothing else. There were no signs of toxin or miasma in the amphora. The corpses of the creatures you slew were likewise free of disease.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab>What? Does this mean our invisible voidsent is indeed what spread the sickness through Nym!?
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_004<tab>That is what I have come to believe. As to why it fled, I can only suppose the long years bound within the vase robbed it of the strength to oppose you.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_005<tab>But surely it can regain that strength! My gods... If it does, the entire realm is at terrible risk!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_006<tab>It does pose a risk, but this is also an opportunity. If we can track it down and lay it low, its corpse may lead us to a cure!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>There is truth in that... Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us pursue this voidsent forthwith!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_000_008<tab>A moment, Alka Zolka. It will require all my skill to track the voidsent, and time besides. Moreover, you cannot afford to be defeated once I have found it. As such, I have requested the aid of an old companion.

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_009<tab>Realm's gone to shite if these sorry specimens're all the Royal Marines've got left. But they'll march like proper soldiers when I'm done, or my name isn't Halga Tolga!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_010<tab>S-Sergeant Tolga!? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you understand who this is!? Before us stands the greatest drill instructor of the Nymian military! Come on─we have much and more to learn!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SURITOCARITO_100_010<tab>Halga will demand much of you, and subject you to seemingly unreasonable tasks. Know that he does this solely for your benefit.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_200_010<tab>No hardship is too great! I will become a marauder worthy of the Nymian military!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_020<tab>Think you've got what it takes to be a Royal Marine? Hah, you make me laugh! Ever worn glasses into battle, boy? Expect your foe to wait while you wipe blood from the lenses, do you!?

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_021<tab>And the <var 1A 02 /var>scholar<var 1A 01 /var>. Had a lot like you in the war. More use dead than alive! Having their corpses piled high around us kept us safer than their damned magicks ever did! You're a bloody joke!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_022<tab>But I'm here to turn you into Royal Marines, and Royal Marines you <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be! First, the creed! “To victory─come hells or high water.” Come on, let me hear you!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any expression that contains the phrase “come hells or high water” to demonstrate your resolve to Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SYSTEM_100_023<tab>come hells or high water
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_200_023<tab>Are you a mammet or a scholar!? If you can't remember five bloody words, then what good are you!? Say “come hells or high water,” or get out of my sight!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SYSTEM_300_023<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any expression that contains the phrase “come hells or high water” to demonstrate your resolve to Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_024<tab>To victory─come hells or high water!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_025<tab>How do you expect to strike fear into your enemies whispering like that!? Open your gobs, and say it like you mean it!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any expression that contains the phrase “come hells or high water” to prove yourself to Halga Tolga.
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_027<tab><var 1A 02 /var>TO VICTORY─COME HELLS OR HIGH WATER, SIR<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_028<tab>Well, you show spirit, I'll give you that... Now, to your tasks!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_029<tab>First, the scholar! There's a band of Mamool Ja sellswords that've been eyeing our palace. Walk up to them with a great, stupid grin, and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>laugh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the leader's face!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_030<tab>The whoresons'll hurl everything they've got at you for that. Acquit yourself well and you pass. Now go!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_100_030<tab>Too craven to laugh at a Mamool Ja!? Then you've no place in the Royal Marines! Do it or don't come back!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_MAMOOLJAMERCENARYCAPTAIN_000_031<tab>Wh-Why you laugh? You think Mamool Ja <var 1A 02 /var>funny<var 1A 01 /var>!? No! You funny! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> laugh, see!? AHAHA...ha... Er... You die now!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_MAMOOLJAMERCENARYCAPTAIN_000_032<tab>What? You talk to Mamool Ja? No? Then who you talk to!?
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_040<tab>Hah! You're both still alive. Not half bad!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_041<tab>But any real marine could've done it twice as fast! You truly are the sorriest excuse for a unit I have <var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var> seen!

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_042<tab>With all due respect, sir, the tasks you gave us were... I mean, what was I supposed to achieve by massaging that man with...<var 1A 02 /var>salamander<var 1A 01 /var> oil?

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_043<tab>You bloody fool! If you've got to ask, then clearly you learned <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var>! And you, scholar─are you going to tell me you don't know why I had you fight without a protector!?

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_044<tab>Chaos reigns on the battlefield! The marines around you are all you've got, and they will <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> failings!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_045<tab>Marines, scholars─<var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> has to do whatever it takes to survive! To be all they can be!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_HALGATOLGA_000_046<tab>Until you understand that, you're not fit to face even the weakest voidsent! That is all for today. Now get back to training─you're dismissed!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_047<tab>Sir, yes, sir! I...I have been a fool, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I will do as he says! To victory─come hells or high water!
TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>deleted

TEXT_JOBSCH560_01674_ALKAZOLKA_000_048<tab>Whew... I have done many and more strange things in pursuit of my goals, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but massaging a man with salamander oil is the strangest yet...
